languages.text: {n}Боль сковала сердце эльдарки, отразившись печалью в глазах.{/n} "Неизлечимая. Непостижимая. Болезнь искажала Крударах и все, к чему прикасалась, избегая встречи лишь с душами наших предков. Никто так и не сумел опознать природу проклятия, и потому, отчаявшись сохранить свой мир, мои собратья решили просто бежать прочь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Боль сковала сердце эльдарки, отразившись печалью в глазах.{/n} "Неизлечимая. Непостижимая. Болезнь искажала Крударах и все, к чему прикасалась, избегая встречи лишь с душами наших предков. Никто так и не сумел опознать природу проклятия, и потому, отчаявшись сохранить свой мир, мои собратья решили просто бежать прочь".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}The pain twisting Yrliet's heart can be seen in the sorrow that lights her eyes.{/n} "Inscrutable. Incurable. The malady twisted Crudarach and everything it touched, avoiding only the spirits of our ancestors. No one could divine the nature of this curse, and so my kin gave up hope of saving their world. Despairing, they chose to flee instead."
languages.original_text: {n}Боль сковала сердце эльдарки, отразившись печалью в глазах.{/n} "Неизлечимая. Непостижимая. Болезнь искажала Крударах и все, к чему прикасалась, избегая встречи лишь с душами наших предков. Никто так и не сумел опознать природу проклятия, и потому, отчаявшись сохранить свой мир, мои собратья решили просто бежать прочь".

traits.locale_text: {n}The pain twisting Yrliet's heart can be seen in the gleam of her eyes.{/n} "Inscrutable. Incurable. The malady twisted Crudarach and everything it touched, avoiding only the spirits of our ancestors. No one could divine the nature of this curse, and so my kin gave up on rescuing their world. Despairing, they chose to flee instead."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特眼神中露出了悲伤的神色，你感觉到她的心在痛苦中扭曲。{/n}“无法捉摸，无法治愈。那种腐化扭曲了克鲁达拉赫与它所接触到的一切，仅仅放过了我们先祖的灵魂。没人能解释这种诅咒究竟是怎么来的，因此，我的族人放弃了拯救方舟世界的希望。在绝望之中，他们选择了逃亡。”
languages.original_text: {n}The pain twisting Yrliet's heart can be seen in the sorrow that lights her eyes.{/n} "Inscrutable. Incurable. The malady twisted Crudarach and everything it touched, avoiding only the spirits of our ancestors. No one could divine the nature of this curse, and so my kin gave up hope of saving their world. Despairing, they chose to flee instead."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特眼神中露出了悲伤的神色，你感觉到她的心在痛苦中扭曲。{/n}“无法捉摸，无法治愈。那种腐化扭曲了克鲁达拉赫与它所接触到的一切，仅仅放过了我们先祖的灵魂。没人能解释这种诅咒究竟是怎么来的，因此，我的族人放弃了拯救方舟世界的希望。在绝望之中，他们选择了逃亡。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The pain twisting Yrliet's heart can be seen in the sorrow that lights her eyes.{/n} "Inscrutable. Incurable. The malady twisted Crudarach and everything it touched, avoiding only the spirits of our ancestors. No one could divine the nature of this curse, and so my kin gave up hope of saving their world. Despairing, they chose to flee instead."

languages.text: {n}El dolor que perfora el corazón de Yrliet se refleja en la pena que brilla en sus ojos.{/n} «Inescrutable. Incurable. La enfermedad corrompió Crudarach y todo lo que tocó, evitando tan solo los espíritus de nuestros ancestros. Nadie logró averiguar el origen de esa maldición, de modo que mi gente abandonó toda esperanza de salvar su mundo. En su desesperación, decidieron huir».
languages.original_text: {n}The pain twisting Yrliet's heart can be seen in the sorrow that lights her eyes.{/n} "Inscrutable. Incurable. The malady twisted Crudarach and everything it touched, avoiding only the spirits of our ancestors. No one could divine the nature of this curse, and so my kin gave up hope of saving their world. Despairing, they chose to flee instead."

traits.locale_text: {n}El dolor que perfora el corazón de Yrliet se refleja en la pena que brilla en sus ojos.{/n} «Inescrutable. Incurable. La enfermedad corrompió Crudarach y todo lo que tocó, evitando tan solo los espíritus de nuestros ancestros. Nadie logró averiguar el origen de esa maldición, de modo que mi gente abandonó toda esperanza de salvar su mundo. En su desesperación, decidieron huir».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの心を歪める苦痛は、彼女の目を照らす悲しみの中に見て取れた。{/n}「不可解。不治。この病は父祖の霊魂だけは避けるように、クルダラとそれに触れるものすべてをねじまげた。誰もがこの呪いの正体を知ることができず、私の同族は己の世界を救う望みを捨てた。絶望した彼らは、代わりに逃げることを選んだのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The pain twisting Yrliet's heart can be seen in the sorrow that lights her eyes.{/n} "Inscrutable. Incurable. The malady twisted Crudarach and everything it touched, avoiding only the spirits of our ancestors. No one could divine the nature of this curse, and so my kin gave up hope of saving their world. Despairing, they chose to flee instead."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの心を歪める苦痛は、彼女の目を照らす悲しみの中に見て取れた。{/n}「不可解。不治。この病は父祖の霊魂だけは避けるように、クルダラとそれに触れるものすべてをねじまげた。誰もがこの呪いの正体を知ることができず、私の同族は己の世界を救う望みを捨てた。絶望した彼らは、代わりに逃げることを選んだのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Schmerz, der Yrliets Herz zerreißt, ist abzulesen an der Trauer, die ihre Augen zum Leuchten bringt.{/n} "Unergründlich. Unheilbar. Die Krankheit veränderte Crudarach und alles, was sie berührte. Nur vor den Geistern unserer Ahnen machte sie halt. Niemand konnte das Wesen dieses Fluchs ergründen, daher gab mein Volk die Hoffnung auf, seine Welt zu retten. Verzweifelt entschieden sie, stattdessen zu fliehen."
languages.original_text: {n}The pain twisting Yrliet's heart can be seen in the sorrow that lights her eyes.{/n} "Inscrutable. Incurable. The malady twisted Crudarach and everything it touched, avoiding only the spirits of our ancestors. No one could divine the nature of this curse, and so my kin gave up hope of saving their world. Despairing, they chose to flee instead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Schmerz, der Yrliets Herz zerreißt, ist abzulesen an der Trauer, die ihre Augen zum Leuchten bringt.{/n} "Unergründlich. Unheilbar. Die Krankheit veränderte Crudarach und alles, was sie berührte. Nur vor den Geistern unserer Ahnen machte sie halt. Niemand konnte das Wesen dieses Fluchs ergründen, daher gab mein Volk die Hoffnung auf, seine Welt zu retten. Verzweifelt entschieden sie, stattdessen zu fliehen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}La douleur qui étreint le cœur d'Yrliet est se lit dans ses yeux emplis de chagrin.{/n} « Impénétrable. Incurable. Cette maladie a dénaturé Crudarach et tout ce qu'elle touchait, hormis les esprits de nos ancêtres qui ont été les seuls à être épargnés. Comme personne ne parvenait à déterminer la nature de cette malédiction, mon peuple a abandonné tout espoir de sauver son monde. Désespéré, il a choisi de fuir. »
languages.original_text: {n}The pain twisting Yrliet's heart can be seen in the sorrow that lights her eyes.{/n} "Inscrutable. Incurable. The malady twisted Crudarach and everything it touched, avoiding only the spirits of our ancestors. No one could divine the nature of this curse, and so my kin gave up hope of saving their world. Despairing, they chose to flee instead."

traits.locale_text: {n}La douleur qui étreint le cœur d'Yrliet est se lit dans ses yeux emplis de chagrin.{/n} « Impénétrable. Incurable. Cette maladie a dénaturé Crudarach et tout ce qu'elle touchait, hormis les esprits de nos ancêtres qui ont été les seuls à être épargnés. Comme personne ne parvenait à déterminer la nature de cette malédiction, mon peuple a abandonné tout espoir de sauver son monde. Désespéré, il a choisi de fuir. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in yüreğini sıkıştıran acı, gözlerine yansıyan kederden okunabiliyor.{/n} "Anlaşılmaz... Çare bulunmaz... O hastalık, hem Crudarach'ı hem de dokunduğu her şeyi yolundan saptırdı. Yalnızca atalarımızın ruhlarına dokunmadı. Hiç kimse bu lanetin tabiatını kestiremedi. Soydaşlarım da dünyalarını kurtarmadan umutlarını kestiler. Bunun yerine çaresizce kaçmayı seçtiler."
languages.original_text: {n}The pain twisting Yrliet's heart can be seen in the sorrow that lights her eyes.{/n} "Inscrutable. Incurable. The malady twisted Crudarach and everything it touched, avoiding only the spirits of our ancestors. No one could divine the nature of this curse, and so my kin gave up hope of saving their world. Despairing, they chose to flee instead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in yüreğini sıkıştıran acı, gözlerine yansıyan kederden okunabiliyor.{/n} "Anlaşılmaz... Çare bulunmaz... O hastalık, hem Crudarach'ı hem de dokunduğu her şeyi yolundan saptırdı. Yalnızca atalarımızın ruhlarına dokunmadı. Hiç kimse, bu lanetin tabiatını kestiremedi. Soydaşlarım da dünyalarını kurtarmadan umutlarını kestiler. Bunun yerine çaresizce kaçmayı seçtiler."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
